shape up.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to improve your behaviour or work
shape up.translation[0].definitions[0].e: You kids had better shape up, because I’m in no mood to fool around.
shape up.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to make progress in a particular way
shape up.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Ken’s plans for the business are shaping up nicely.
Immigration is shaping up as a major issue in the campaign.
It’s shaping up to be a pretty big party.
shape up.translation[0].definitions[2].d: used to tell someone that if they do not improve, they will be made to leave a place or their job
